page.title: Construo
page.section:
Construo is a simple 2D construction programm (it is currently not a real game) for objects which consist of rod's and springs and let them react on physical forces. You can currently construct buildings and objects like bridges, towers, spaceshuttles, etc. and you let them fall to ground and the seem smash and break. Sound like fun, doesn't it =;-)
The game is similar to Bridge Builder and heavily inspired from the Gamasutra article Collision Response: Bouncy, Trouncy, Fun. Its covered under the GNU General Public License, thats means source code is availabel and you are allowed to modify it.

section.subsection:

To compile it you also need libxml2 and ClanLib, if you don't know what I am talking about, just use the binary, it will save you a lot of throuble.
